channel.title: DeathScape317 D claws Ags 317 [Delta]
channel.description:
Hey guys this is my first realease its a easy soucre to work with first i would like to give credits to Romanage Dan thats who i downloaded source from its his, just coded alot second many thanks to Clawz Fury For helping me out with everything gave me alot of tips and good advice
The Server Has in it. D Claws. Ags Phats Santas Vls Statious Added some objects my gamble box (good for eco) removed p rings You might wanna remove monkey bags it isent to great Bandos kite Bandos Scim Jads GodSword
NOTE: i dident add any of these models in fact i dont do good with delta clients and models The Soucre is the Best part
HERE are some pictures
EVERYONE LIKES PICTURES! [IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/DeathScape1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/DeathScape2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/DeathScape3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/DeathScape4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/DeathScape5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/DeathScape6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/DeathScape7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/DeathScape8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/DeathScape9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/DeathScape10.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i848.photobucket.com/albums/ab42/omfgstfunoob/DeathScape11.jpg[/img] Soucre [url=http://uppit.com/zi2qfbr1tmc4/DeathScape.rar]http://uppit.com/zi2qfbr1tmc4/DeathScape.rar[/url] Client [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23270301/Client.rar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23270301/Client.rar[/url] I DID NOT CREATE THE CLIENT I DOWNLOADED IT. SO I GIVE CREDETS TO I OWN JAD
VIRUS SCAN il post soon i can assure it isent a virus.
If you need any help add my msn Hobojobo1@hotmail.com NOTE: THIS IS MY FIRST SERVER!

item.title: DeathScape317 D claws Ags 317 [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Here are a few things for you to change if you plan on making a V2 or another server etc.

  1. Make monsters drop rares at very little percentage to make the economy better.
  2. Try using less customs (Although the recoloured whips are pretty sexy).
• Be more creative, for example, with the gamble chest you could have made a dialogue where a witch asks you a bunch of questions, and each time you talk to her you get a new set of questions, then if you choose the right dialogue question you must pay 100k and you can gamble.
This would be more advanced for a beginner so he would need help?

Also, I lol’d at your login text. It says our server is 27/7. Did you mean to do that or…?

Read full topic

item.title: DeathScape317 D claws Ags 317 [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:7, topic:387861”]Eh… Could be better, although good job on your first release.

But as James said, you really should continue this development; also, pm me please, I would like to help you with your next release.

Constructive Criticism

[ul][li]The Client you are using is one of the main sources of the problems with this release, change it[/li]
[li]Where is the economy? If you put everything rare in one shop, people will buy it all, and eventually, they won’t be rare anymore, and that means people will start to get bored and quit[/li]
[li]Also, doesn’t really looked like you worked on anything, try switching the home or moving around some objects/npcs[/li]
[li]Be more creative, for example, with the gamble chest you could have made a dialogue where a witch asks you a bunch of questions, and each time you talk to her you get a new set of questions, then if you choose the right dialogue question you must pay 100k and you can gamble.[/li]
[li]Take out anything custom: Items, Pkbox, Staffzone, Ownerzone; makes your server look unprofessional, and like it was programmed by an 11 year old in 2005 (When RSPS was unstable)[/li]
[li]Switching your client will fix 90% of problems on here (Messed up models, Messed up textures, White text when speaking, etc.)[/li][/ul]

Other than that, keep getting better at programming, and eventually you’ll get good, give it a few months.
When I joined moparscape in August 2010, I knew little to nothing about programming, I thought adding a staff area was ‘codeing’ Lol. :P[/quote]
Like he said, try more to work on learning what makes actions happen, the combat timers, and other stuff like that. Learning to make npcs and move things around was the first step, thats the next (: Also clawz fury, why I no on sexlist? D:

Read full topic

item.title: DeathScape317 D claws Ags 317 [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Eh… Could be better, although good job on your first release.

But as James said, you really should continue this development; also, pm me please, I would like to help you with your next release.

Constructive Criticism

[ul][li]The Client you are using is one of the main sources of the problems with this release, change it[/li]
[li]Where is the economy? If you put everything rare in one shop, people will buy it all, and eventually, they won’t be rare anymore, and that means people will start to get bored and quit[/li]
[li]Also, doesn’t really looked like you worked on anything, try switching the home or moving around some objects/npcs[/li]
[li]Be more creative, for example, with the gamble chest you could have made a dialogue where a witch asks you a bunch of questions, and each time you talk to her you get a new set of questions, then if you choose the right dialogue question you must pay 100k and you can gamble.[/li]
[li]Take out anything custom: Items, Pkbox, Staffzone, Ownerzone; makes your server look unprofessional, and like it was programmed by an 11 year old in 2005 (When RSPS was unstable)[/li]
[li]Switching your client will fix 90% of problems on here (Messed up models, Messed up textures, White text when speaking, etc.)[/li][/ul]

Other than that, keep getting better at programming, and eventually you’ll get good, give it a few months.
When I joined moparscape in August 2010, I knew little to nothing about programming, I thought adding a staff area was ‘codeing’ Lol.

Read full topic
